Title: Relates to primary social security retirement benefits for certain police/fire members
Summary: Relates to primary social security retirement benefits for certain police/fire members; provides that in the computation of the normal service retirement benefit of police/fire members who are members of the New York city fire department pension fund, there shall be no reduction for the primary social security retirement benefit.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to primary social security retirement benefits for certain police/fire members
